api dakka pahugiya kalaya purawatamadeshapalanaye thamange awashyathawayan wenuwen aanduwe salli walin deshapalagnyayo badu beduwa.ee wage wada walin udallak thibuna kenatath udallak labuna.ee prathilabha laba gaththa minihath dannawa thamanta me labena deyin wadak na kiyala.nikan dena nisa me dewal ganna pelambaenawa.me widihata winasha kale me rate salli.pahugiya aanduwen me anuradhapura disthrikkaye pawul 21 000 kata kompost kattala gowijana sewa departhamenthuwa haraha bedala thibuna, namuth in kiyen kidenada kompost hadanne.aduma tharame ee kompost kattala laba gath 5000 k wath kompost hadanne na, meka nikan thaman chandaya dunna amathiwaraya, manthriwaraya yamak bedana prathilabha pakshikayo wuwamana wunath nathath udurala gannawa.bari wela hari nodi hitiyoth tharahath wenawa.meka thamayi ape purudda, me dewal sidu nowiya yuthu dewal.mokada me prathilabha deshapalagnyayo laba denne thamange pudgalika dhanayen nemeyi.me serama rajaye salli, me rate janathawa miladi ganna sini kilo ekata, parippu kilo ekata gahana badden thamayi me siyalu de karanne.aanduwak widihata, api amathiwaru widihata ape wagakima wenne aanduwe mudal, prathipadana nisi aakarawa pala- prayojanayak gatha haki pudgalayin wenuwen, awashyaya pudgalayin wenuwen laba diya yuthu wanne.
nawa rajya lekam reks tilarsan da?
